channel.title: Mobs on my server
channel.description: I have Allstar-scape server source, when i make mobs, in autospawn folder, and then log in, i try to kill them, but when their health is 0 it goes back to full and i made a kbd and he haves 40 health but in my options he should to have 2400 health and it also respawns in 1 sec after i have killed it, he gets full health every time... help pls i wanna more realistic mobs on my serv...

item.title: Mobs on my server
item.dc:creator: @SandScape SandScape
item.description:
@SandScape wrote:

Owl:

I have Allstar-scape server source, when i make mobs, in autospawn folder, and then log in, i try to kill them, but when their health is 0 it goes back to full and i made a kbd and he haves 40 health but in my options he should to have 2400 health and it also respawns in 1 sec after i have killed it, he gets full health every time… help pls i wanna more realistic mobs on my serv…

go to autospawn.cfg and edit there hp.

Read full topic
